channel.title: CyberTrace on Haroun Maghraoui
channel.description: Recent content in CyberTrace on Haroun Maghraoui

item.title: Memory Forensics: A Fun Hands on Introduction
item.description: Last weekend, CyberTrace held its first large-scaled event, the Cyber Summit. It held a multitude of conferences and workshops alongside an on-site CTF at night. And I had the honor to be one of the trainers that animated one of the aforementioned workshops. So, as many attendees asked me to, I’m writing this walkthrough to collect and preserve the knowledge shared through the workshop. Plus, I’m hoping this becomes something of use for people wanting to dive in the forensics field as I didn’t find as many well-maintained ressources as i wished while preparing it.
